Posts.Content: If you are taking pain meds don't forget the laxatives!!! I spent New Years Eve on the "Ward" because my Onc gave me meds for the pain but forgot to tell me that pain meds STOP you bowels. Other than that call the doctor. Take care!
Posts.Title: Need help ..sensitive subject .. private area is raw and inflamed from constipation (5 days with movement) .. I need help
